title: Deaths of Despair, with Anne Case
itunes:title: Deaths of Despair, with Anne Case
description:
Anne Case and Angus Deaton released Deaths of Despair this year, the culmination of their study into how your education level determines how much pain you'll experience in life, how long you'll live, and your ability to fend off addiction and despair. Basically: if you lack a college degree, you will die sooner and live harder. Anne Case joins Jessa to discuss these "forgotten" men and women.

Support this podcast: http://patreon.com/publicintellectual

http://jessacrispin.com
